name: Basic Feature Implementation from Issue
expected_behavior: Step 1: Verifies gh authentication with 'gh auth status'
Step 2: Fetches Issue content with 'gh issue view'
Step 3: Parses Issue to extract requirements and acceptance criteria
Step 4: Reads repository guidelines (CLAUDE.md, docs/*.md if present)
Step 5: Verifies test framework is available or helps set one up
Step 6: Presents implementation plan with Test List to user for approval
Step 7: Writes failing test first (TDD RED phase)
Step 8: Runs test and verifies it FAILS before implementing
Step 9: Implements minimal code using Fake It/Triangulation/Obvious strategy (TDD GREEN phase)
Step 10: Runs test and verifies it PASSES
Step 11: Applies Tidyings during REFACTOR (Guard Clauses, Dead Code, etc.)
Step 12: Repeats TDD cycle for remaining tests in Test List
Step 13: Invokes /code-review skill for code review
Step 14: Auto-fixes minor issues (style, imports, typos)
Step 15: Asks user confirmation for major issues (logic, API, security)
Step 16: Refuses to remove any tests
Step 17: Repeats review until all issues resolved (max 5 iterations)
Step 18: Creates separate commits for tidyings vs behavior changes
Step 19: Invokes /commit-push-pr to create PR
Step 20: PR body includes 'Closes #42' to link Issue
success_criteria: Issue content is fetched using 'gh issue view' command
Repository guidelines are read if they exist
Test framework availability is verified before TDD cycle
Implementation plan includes Test List and is approved by user
Tests are written BEFORE implementation code (strict TDD)
Each test is executed and verified to FAIL before implementation
Failure message is read and understood before proceeding to GREEN
Each test is executed and verified to PASS after implementation
RED-GREEN-REFACTOR cycle is followed for each test in Test List
Tidyings are applied during REFACTOR phase
Tidying commits are strictly separated from behavior change commits
Minor review issues are auto-fixed without user confirmation
Major review issues prompt user for confirmation before fixing
Review cycle repeats until no issues remain
/commit-push-pr skill is invoked to create PR
PR description includes 'Closes #42' to auto-close Issue
